objects.description:
Monitor for newly constructed registry keys or values to aid in persistence and execution. Detection of creation of registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\SafeDllSearchMode. The key SafeDllSearchMode, if set to 0, will block the Windows mechanism for the search DLL order and adversaries may execute their own malicious dll.

Analytic 1 - Registry Edit with Creation of SafeDllSearchMode Key Set to 0

safe_dll_search_processes = filter processes where command_line CONTAINS("*SafeDllSearchMode*") AND ((command_line CONTAINS("*reg*") AND command_line CONTAINS("*add*") AND command_line CONTAINS("*/d*")) OR (command_line CONTAINS("*Set-ItemProperty*") AND command_line CONTAINS(*-value*)) OR ((command_line CONTAINS("*00000000*") AND command_line CONTAINS(*0*))) reg_keys = search Registry:value_edit safe_dll_reg_keys = filter reg_keys where value="SafeDllSearchMode" AND value_data="0"
